examples.korean: She could not endure the thought of parting. 발음듣기 그녀는 헤어진다는 생각을 견딜 수가 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She could not endure the thought of parting. 발음

examples.korean: an intolerable burden / situation 발음듣기 견딜 수 없는 부담/상황 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
I can’t stand much more of this. 발음듣기 난 이것을 더 이상 견딜 수가 없어. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can’t stand much more of this. 발음

examples.korean: I can’t stand the sight of blood. 발음듣기 나는 피를 보는 것은 견딜 수가 없다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I can’t stand the sight of blood. 발음

examples.korean: She thought she would not be able to bear the load of bringing up her family alone. 발음듣기 그녀는 혼자서 가족을 부양하는 부담을 견딜 수가 없을 거라고 생각했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She thought she would not be able to bear the load of bringing up her family alone. 발음
